choiceresponse.label: Let's make sure you've completed all the CC tasks presented in this unit.

choice.div: I've signed the Core Contributor Program Agreement
I've said hi in #core-contributors in Slack
I've added myself to the Core Contributor wiki page
I've made an account on the Open edX forums so I can participate in and be tagged in sprint retrospectives

I can access Listaflow (sprint retrospective tool) - Note: you will need to message Fox Danger Piacenti on the Open edX slack to request access to Listaflow. Please send him the link to your Core Contributor nomination thread from the forums.
I have added the Working Groups calendar to my calendar.
